timeline.message: Add a validation of MultiSelect on the JsonFormFragment.
Add a method to perform validation on MultiSelectList Factory
Modified a MultiSelect Test class to get a static field from the MultiSelect Factory class

timeline.bodyText: what would happen if there is 2 multiselect in one form? given multiSelectListAccessoryHashMap is static
timeline.author: Andati

replies.bodyText: @Andati - an adapterKey is used to get ItemList as well as the ListOfSelected items, so it will use the key of the defined multiselect for each. I have tested this with two MultiSelect in a single form and seems to be working. I am also open if you have any suggestion.
replies.author: gosso22
